raw_comment: I feel that it is unfair to the students who have to work hard to get into a college will be passed over for an applicant who is a legacy. The fact that legacy with money has a 6x chance of getting chosen makes me wonder how often legacy with generational wealth goes to schools that parents or grandparents went to.
ace_sentences: Some students have to work hard to get into a college.
I feel that it is unfair if a college passes over a student for a legacy applicant.
A legacy applicant with money has a 6x chance of getting chosen.
This fact makes me wonder how often a legacy applicant with generational wealth goes to a school.
The parents of the legacy applicant went to this school or the grandparents of the legacy applicant went to this school.
